schema.name: Author
schema.description: Area paths allow you to group work items by team, product, or feature area

schema.name: email_author
schema.description: Iteration paths allow you to group work into sprints, milestones, or other event-specific. Format: Project-PI i-Iteration i

schema.name: price
schema.description: You use work items to track features and requirements you're developing, code defects or bugs, and issues or risks to your project. Each work item is based on a work item type that determines the work item fields available for tracking information
